CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION institution_change_trigger() RETURNS TRIGGER AS $instchange$ DECLARE addr RECORD; mailing_addr RECORD; BEGIN SELECT * INTO addr FROM address a WHERE a.key = NEW.address_key; SELECT * INTO mailing_addr FROM address a WHERE a.key = NEW.mailing_address_key;
NEW.fulltext_search := SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(NEW.code,''))),'A') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(NEW.name,''))),'A') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(NEW.description,''))),'B') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(array_to_string(akeys(NEW.alternative_codes), ' '),''))),'B') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(array_to_string(NEW.additional_names, ' '),''))),'B') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(addr.city,''))),'B') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(addr.province,''))),'B') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(addr.country,''))),'B') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(addr.address,''))),'C') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(mailing_addr.city,''))),'C') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(mailing_addr.province,''))),'C') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(mailing_addr.country,''))),'C') || SETWEIGHT(TO_TSVECTOR('pg_catalog.english', unaccent(COALESCE(mailing_addr.address,''))),'D'); RETURN NEW; END; $instchange$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
